titleStmt.title: The charge of schism continued being a justification of the author of Christian blessedness for his charging the separatists with schism, not withstanding the toleration : in a letter to a city-friend.
titleStmt.author: Norris, John, 1657-1711.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Norris by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
